text:
If you want to download the images you generated with DALL·E, you might be wondering how to do it in bulk. Unfortunately, there is no option to download multiple images at once from the website. However, you can still download your images individually by following these steps: 


1. Click on the image you want to save. This will open the image in a larger view, with some options to edit it, share it, or create variations.
2. To download the image, simply click on the download icon in the top right corner of the image. This looks like a downward arrow with a horizontal line under it.

​
title: How can I bulk download my generations?
